phrases.phrase: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
phrases.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

phrases.phrase: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
phrases.author: Albert Einstein

phrases.phrase: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
phrases.author: Mae West

phrases.phrase: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
phrases.author: Mark Twain

phrases.phrase: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
phrases.author: Oscar Wilde
